main event: Witnesses observed a mysterious explosion and a cigar-shaped object emitting a dazzling light in the sky over Greymouth, New Zealand.
interesting points: The explosion was heard over a large area of hundreds of square miles,The cigar-shaped object was described as traveling at high speed and losing altitude towards the Southern Alps, Eyewitnesses reported an interesting light display from the object,There were also unconfirmed reports of a green fireball over Texas that lit up a room before it disappeared, A separate report discussed radioactive cotton fiber found in Horseheads, New York, linked to earlier mysterious sightings.
